snippet: Officials are looking for a way to remove President Bashar al-Assad from power, but to do so the United States may have to move beyond diplomatic efforts.
abstract: News analysis; United States, dismayed by the escalating violence in Syria and the blocking of tougher action against the Syrian government by Russia and China, is looking for a way to remove President Bashar al-Assad from power; to do so without the force of a United Nations Security Council resolution, though, means that the US may have to move beyond diplomatic efforts.
lead_paragraph: Officials are looking for a way to remove President Bashar al-Assad from power, but to do so the United States may have to move beyond diplomatic efforts.

headline.seo: White House Continues Push for Change in Syria
headline.main: Solution on Syria Remains Elusive for White House
headline.print_headline: Solution on Syria Remains Elusive for White House

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
